data.eml:eml: Cladocera (Crustacea: Ctenopoda, Anomopoda) from southern Mexico, Belize and northern Guatemala, with some biogeographical notes

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Elías-Gutiérrez, Manuel, Kotov, Alexey A., Garfias-Espejo, Tania (2006): Cladocera (Crustacea: Ctenopoda, Anomopoda) from southern Mexico, Belize and northern Guatemala, with some biogeographical notes. Zootaxa 1119: 1-27, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171670
